snippet: The ruling found that the concrete cross, on federal land in San Diego, was in violation of the First Amendment.
abstract: Federal judge rules that a cross on federal land in San Diego violates the First Amendment ban on a government endorsement of religion, ordering it removed within 90 days.
lead_paragraph: The ruling found that the concrete cross, on federal land in San Diego, was in violation of the First Amendment.

headline.main: Judge Rules Against Cross on U.S. Land
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Against Cross On U.S. Land
